Class LightSensor

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class LightSensor
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The LightSensor class gets the light value from the sensor and sends it to DataExchange
